ygData.subject: Woven Or Netted Armor For A Wizard?
ygData.msgSnippet: I am currently a level 10 High Elf Wizard, and I have a Sr. Apprentice robe along with a full set of cloth armor. I would like to get either a full set of the
ygData.messageBody:
I am currently a level 10 High Elf Wizard, and I have a Sr. Apprentice robe along with a full set of cloth armor. I would like to get either a full set of the woven or the netted armor next, as an upgrade from the cloth that I have now. I would like to know which of the two types would be best to get next. Also, what are the stats compared to the cloth armor? Any help would be appreciated!
Regards,
Kelill
